examples: The court found in her favor.
The ambassador curried favor with the dictator by praising his construction projects.
I favor anything that tilts the scales in my direction.
They are doing their neighbor a favor by mowing their lawn.
do me a favor and stick a sock in it.
words.defineEn: a kind act that is done to help a person
words.defineVi: một hành động tử tế được thực hiện để giúp đỡ một người

examples: The driver of the car opened the car door for the passengers.
The waiter opened the bottle of wine for the guests.
The library opens at 10 o'clock on weekdays.
right on cue the door opened
The store stays open late on Thursdays.
words.defineEn: (of a door or window) to become open so that people, things, etc. can pass through
words.defineVi: (của cửa ra vào hoặc cửa sổ) trở nên mở để mọi người, đồ vật, v.v. có thể đi qua

examples: For children, picture books provide a window onto the world.
The closed window blocked out the noise from the street.
The photographs clearly show a broken window.
Two faces appeared at our window.
Language is a window into the world.
words.defineEn: a space in a wall or vehicle that is made of glass and we use to look outside or get some fresh air
words.defineVi: một không gian trong một bức tường hoặc chiếc xe được làm bằng kính và chúng tôi sử dụng để nhìn ra bên ngoài hoặc hít thở không khí trong lành

examples: The shopkeeper closed the shop for a short break.
The police closed in.
The business has already closed the books for this quarter.
Detectives had closed the book on the Hornsey Murders case three years previously.
The library closes early on Sundays.
words.defineEn: to move something like a window or door into a position that people or things cannot pass through
words.defineVi: để di chuyển một cái gì đó như cửa sổ hoặc cửa ra vào một vị trí mà mọi người hoặc những thứ không thể đi qua

examples: Close the door, please.
Which door leads to the yard?
right on cue the door opened
That accident battered up the door of my car.
The driver of the car opened the car door for the passengers.
words.defineEn: the thing we move to enter, exit, or access a place such as a vehicle, building, room, etc.
words.defineVi: thứ chúng ta di chuyển để vào, ra hoặc tiếp cận một địa điểm như xe cộ, tòa nhà, phòng, v.v.

examples: If the child doesn't get what he wants, he immediately turns on the waterworks.
The closet had a light that automatically turned on when the door was opened.
I accidentally spilled water on my laptop, and now it won't turn on.
I turned on the air conditioner because it was getting too hot inside.
"Turn on?"
words.defineEn: to cause a machine, device, or equipment to operate, typically by pushing a button or turning a key
words.defineVi: để làm cho máy móc, thiết bị hoặc thiết bị hoạt động, thường bằng cách nhấn nút hoặc xoay chìa khóa

examples: The car ahead of me jumped the light.
The lights changed to green.
Sometimes darkness can show you the light.
A major technological advancement like that is still light years away.
This software first saw the light of day back in 1993.
words.defineEn: a type of electromagnetic radiation that makes it possible to see, produced by the sun or another source of illumination
words.defineVi: một loại bức xạ điện từ giúp chúng ta có thể nhìn thấy, được tạo ra bởi mặt trời hoặc một nguồn chiếu sáng khác

examples: He reached over and turned off his bedside light.
Jill must have been in another world when I asked her to turn off the oven because the bread is burned now.
"Turn off?"
Once inside, he turned off the security alarm.
Don't turn off the captions.
words.defineEn: to cause a machine, device, or equipment to stop operating, typically by pushing a button or turning a key
words.defineVi: làm cho máy móc, thiết bị hoặc thiết bị ngừng hoạt động, thường bằng cách nhấn nút hoặc vặn chìa khóa

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.
The TV quiz was more fun than a barrel of monkeys!
The TV stays on all day in their house.
Millions of people followed the trial on TV.
She regularly appears on TV.
words.defineEn: an electronic device that shows images and videos and plays sounds and people use to watch different programs
words.defineVi: một thiết bị điện tử hiển thị hình ảnh và video và phát âm thanh và mọi người sử dụng để xem các chương trình khác nhau

examples: The Canadian team handed the game to them on a silver plate.
The girl held her father's hand tightly.
She handed me a clean plate for dessert.
The police had the situation well in hand.
The prisoner held his head in his hands.
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho một cái gì đó cho một ai đó

words.defineEn: a pair of lenses set in a frame that rests on the nose and ears, which we wear to see more clearly
words.defineVi: một cặp thấu kính được đặt trong một khung nằm trên mũi và tai mà chúng ta đeo để nhìn rõ hơn

examples: The support of our families has helped enormously.
Helping you?
Such helps were like drop in the ocean.
The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
His help is useful as a chocolate teapot.
words.defineEn: to give someone what they need or to make doing something easier or possible for them
words.defineVi: để cung cấp cho ai đó những gì họ cần hoặc để làm điều gì đó dễ dàng hơn hoặc có thể cho họ
